text: David Destorme (born 30 August 1979) is a Belgian retired football player last playing for Waasland-Beveren. == Career == On 10 June 2009, the 29-year-old attacking midfielder has left FCV Dender EH to sign a four-year deal with KV Mechelen. ==References== ==External links== * David Destorme at Soccerway * David Destorme at Footballdatabase Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:F.C.V. title: David Destorme
